original_text: The Israelites had travelled in the desert for 40 years. But all the men who were old enough to fight when they left Egypt had now died. This happened because they had not obeyed the Lord. The Lord had promised to give to them the land of Canaan, a land where there is plenty of food and drink. But he made a strong promise that those men would not see that land, because they had turned against him.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손들이 여호와의 음성을 청종하지 아니하므로 여호와께서 그들에게 대하여 맹세하사 그들의 조상들에게 맹세하여 우리에게 주리라고 하신 땅 곧 젖과 꿀이 흐르는 땅을 그들이 보지 못하게 하리라 하시매 애굽에서 나온 족속 곧 군사들이 다 멸절하기까지 사십 년 동안을 광야에서 헤매었더니

sentences.original_text: The Israelites had travelled in the desert
But all the men who were old enough to fight
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 전투할 만큼 나이가 든 모든 남자들은

sentences.original_text: This happened because they had not obeyed the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 그들이 주님을 순종하지 않았기 때문에 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: The Lord had promised to give to them the land of Canaan
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 그들에게 가나안 땅을 주겠다고 약속하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: a land where there is plenty of food and drink
But he made a strong promise
that those men would not see that land
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자들이 그 땅을 보지 않을 것이라는

sentences.original_text: because they had turned against him
